Articles.Content: I've noticed that after 1.0 came out there were no "the daily kerbal" things. Does this mean that we won't see them anymore?
I'm sure they'll return, but the dev team is on a break after the 1.0 release, I think.

Confirmed, all of them got flown to Mexico and are "working". I think skydiving was mentioned ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I expect the Daily Kerbal to return in a few weeks.

> 
> Confirmed, all of them got flown to Mexico and are "working". I think skydiving was mentioned ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> I expect the Daily Kerbal to return in a few weeks.

Ah, must be research for Kerbal parachutes.
Thank you for answers! I shouldn't really worry about this.

> 
> Ah, must be research for Kerbal parachutes.

They might be at the Yucatan, studying the effect of an asteroid redirect missing gone wrong.
They haven't stopped making them. They're just taking dealing with the 1.0 release and taking a break.
